name: Topdown dungeon game idk what to call it
name_original: Topdown dungeon game idk what to call it
description:
Keyboard controls
  • V-----=Shoot
  • Space-=Sword
  • Shift-=Stop moving
Mouse controls
  • Middle-=Shoot
  • Left---=Sword
  • Right--=Stop moving
Controller controls
  • X/Y-=Shoot
  • A/B-=Sword
  • RB--=Stop moving
Generic controls
  • Esc/Select(controller)-=Pause
